gmx:name.gco:CharacterString: Feature catalog for Passenger Railways Connectivity: United States, 2013

gmx:scope.gco:CharacterString: Airports; Railroad stations; Buses; Local transit; Terminals (Transportation)

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Attributes of Intermodal Passenger Facilities
A unique nine character facility identifier consisting of the state code for the facility, the zip code, and a sequential two digit number assigned to facilities within that zip code.
Point
Unique identifier for the transportation facility. The identifier is the same for records of different modes that are located at the same facility
City where the facility is located
Postal state abbreviation
Name of Census Bureau Core Based Statistical Area (Metro Area) where the facility is located.

Longitude, Decimal degrees for the facility identified by the point_ID. When two or more records are found at the same location, POINT_LON is the average of the Longitude fields for those records; otherwise same as the Longitude field.

Latitude, Decimal degrees for the facility identified by the point_ID. When two or more records are found at the same location, POINT_LAT is the average of the Latitude fields for those records; otherwise same as the Latitude field.

Census Bureau Core Based Statistical Area Code
Indicates whether CBSA is a Metropolitan Statistical Area (population at least 50,000+) or a Micropolitan Statistical Area (population 10,000-50,000)
Not in a CBSA

Count of the Number of Transportation Modes Serving the Facility (from ModeBus, ModeAir, ModeRailStd, ModeRailTrt, ModeFerry)
